name: FLOW DASH
description:
"Flow Dash" is a minimalistic & casual puzzle game where players need to connect their circuits in the game to make the circuit run successfully.

Gameplay:
- Click on the switch in the middle to push the current out. The player needs to turn the rotatable wire ahead of time, arrange a reasonable route, direct the current to the electronic component, and let the current flow before reaching the gear.

Game features
- 50 levels in all.
- Concise images
- Somehow test the players' physics knowledge
- Easy to get start
